resources.string: CREATE TABLE Block ( BlockID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, FarmID INTEGER NOT NULL, BlockName TEXT NOT NULL, LastModifiedID INTEGER , TMStamp TEXT, FOREIGN KEY (FarmID) REFERENCES Farm(FarmID) )

CREATE TABLE Farm ( FarmID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, UserID INTEGER NOT NULL, FarmName TEXT NOT NULL, LastModifiedID INTEGER NULL, TMStamp TEXT, FOREIGN KEY (UserID) REFERENCES User(UserID) )
CREATE TABLE Role ( RoleID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, RoleDescription TEXT NOT NULL, LastModifiedID INTEGER, TMStamp TEXT )

CREATE TABLE ScoutBug ( ScoutBugID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, ScoutStopID INTEGER NOT NULL, SpeciesID INTEGER NOT NULL, NumberOfBugs INTEGER NOT NULL, FieldPicture BLOB NOT NULL, Comments TEXT, LastModifiedID INTEGER, TMStamp TEXT, FOREIGN KEY (ScoutStopID) REFERENCES ScoutStop(ScoutStopID), FOREIGN KEY (SpeciesID) REFERENCES Species(SpeciesID) )

CREATE TABLE ScoutStop ( ScoutStopID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, UserID INTEGER NOT NULL, BlockID INTEGER NOT NULL, NumberOfTrees INTEGER NOT NULL, Latitude REAL NOT NULL, Longitude REAL NOT NULL, Date TEXT NOT NULL, LastModifiedID INTEGER, TMStamp TEXT, FOREIGN KEY (UserID) REFERENCES User(UserID), FOREIGN KEY (BlockID) REFERENCES Block(BlockID) )

CREATE TABLE Species ( SpeciesID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, SpeciesName TEXT NOT NULL, Lifestage INTEGER NOT NULL, IdealPicture BLOB NOT NULL, IsPest BIT NOT NULL, LastModifiedID INTEGER, TMStamp TEXT )

CREATE TABLE Treatment ( TreatmentID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, BlockID INTEGER NOT NULL, Date TEXT NOT NULL, Comments TEXT, LastModifiedID INTEGER, TMStamp TEXT, FOREIGN KEY (BlockID) REFERENCES Block(BlockID) )

CREATE TABLE User ( UserID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, RoleID INTEGER NOT NULL, Email TEXT NOT NULL, Password TEXT NOT NULL, LastModifiedID INTEGER NULL, TMStamp TEXT, FOREIGN KEY (RoleID) REFERENCES Role(RoleID) )
